p: Bergaptol was found as the principal metabolite in human urine by liquid chromatography tandem mass spectrometry (LC‐MS‐MS) analysis after ingestion of grapefruit juice containing bergamottin and 6′,7′‐dihydroxybergamottin (Messer et al., 2011; Lee et al., 2016, as referenced in Melough et al., 2018a).
